name: Quantized Manifolds
description:
A turn-based survival sandbox with complex tessellations & non-euclidean geometry.

  • Survive, farm, craft, explore, & colonise strange worlds, just be careful to not get lost & die
  • The only game that lets you play in 2.5D hyperbolic space, 2-layer surfaces in an exponentially infinite space
  • If you ever feel the need to scream "EUCLID SAVE ME!", don't worry, you can just construct a portal to a boring euclidean plane

The game is currently in alpha.

You can find me in the discord server: https://discord.gg/8Qsnrq6V4A
